生物Mod
英文原文：These work differently and unfortunately are not straight forward, how these work is they turn any item drops into the mob of your choice. These mobs will not have full health and I have tested an arrow will one hit one of the creepers. The item drops will be converted when you reload the map, so if you are playing survival with creeper mod left patched and don't want creepers every where, pick up the item drops before quitting.

replies.author: Minezeratul
replies.txt_content: 请注明是安卓还是Ios，而且之前已经有人发过了。

replies.author: pogox
replies.txt_content: 加分和扣分抵消。。。楼主以后请注意
